requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8550U (4 * 1800) or equivalent / AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 (2048 VRAM) / Radeon R7 260X (2048 VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (4096 VRAM) / Radeon RX 570 (4096 VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
